overview: From the moment I first met her I have been a fan of this amazing girl! Cytherea is the most unique performer in all my years of watching and making porn. She's breathtakingly gorgeous, hotter than molten lava, and as sweet as candy. Her performances in Squirtwoman will leave you slack jawed and rock hard...or dripping wet. I have never seen anything like this, and I've seen a lot of porn! Put on your slickers folks...You're in for a wet ride!
tagline: It's Gonna be a Slippery Ride!
title: Cytherea Iz Squirtwoman
